testcase.classname: Connection to FTP Workaround Server Portal HCID
testcase.name: Select ROLE_IT to enable Menu Outgoing Payment Monitoring (MANDATORY)
testcase.system-out: Given Go to ISTools.........................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Menu "Role Management"...........................................passed And Choose Dropdown Username "mobile.test"..................................passed And Select Role "ROLE_IT"...................................................passed And Click button "Change"...................................................passed And Get text from pop up "Confirm" with text "Are you sure?"................passed And Click button "Yes"......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
